evidence.claim: Trella Health utilizes AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure patient data protection.
Trella Health leverages Apache Kafka for data streaming.
Integration patterns include data exchange with leading EHR systems.
The company uses Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Engages with HIPAA compliant data exchange using X12 and has integration with health tech solutions.
